meanings.definition: The act of turning into a zombie.
meanings.sent1: The zombifications in the movie were quite scary.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the zombifications of the infected individuals.
meanings.sent3: The zombifications at the Halloween party were so realistic, it was hard to tell who was who!
meanings.sent4: The zombifications of the city turned it into a ghost town.
meanings.sent5: The zombifications of the characters in the video game were incredibly detailed.

meanings.definition: The process of zombifying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The zombifications of the virus spread rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The evil sorcerer performed dark zombifications on his enemies.
meanings.sent3: The zombifications of the cupcakes turned them into spooky treats for the party.
meanings.sent4: The zombifications of the mind control experiment were both fascinating and terrifying.
meanings.sent5: The zombifications of the forest gave it an eerie and unsettling atmosphere.
